sentences.en: A red wire is often attached to the anode.
sentences.cn: 红色电线通常与阳极相联.

sentences.en: Choose anode or cathode electrophoresis according to the electrophoresis process and coating.
sentences.cn: 2根据电泳工艺及涂膜性不同,选择阴极电泳或阳极电泳.

sentences.cn: 不溶性铅合金阳极的环境材料化设计.

sentences.en: Each tank shall be furnished with an internal anode for anodic protection.
sentences.cn: 每个内胆都应该配置一体化的阳极以提供阳极保护.

sentences.en: For replacing the anode, shut - off the power to the water heater.
sentences.cn: 如果需要更换阳极棒, 请先关闭热水器电源.

sentences.en: It'shows well - defined wavelengths which are characteristic of the structure of the metal forming the anode.
sentences.cn: 它显示出那构成阳极的金属的结构所特有的,十分确定的波长.

sentences.en: Protective magnesium anode rod - provides added protection against corrosion for long trouble - free service.
sentences.cn: 具有保护作用的金属镁阳极棒 --- 这种金属镁阳极棒能够提高热水器的耐腐蚀能力,延长热水器的无故障寿命.

sentences.en: Second, they are "activating" some of the inactive components, by freeing lithium from the inactive material so that it can move between the cathode and the anode.
sentences.cn: 其次，他们是“激活”消极的一些组件，通过释放从非活动的材料，以便可以移动它们之间的阴极和阳极锂。

sentences.en: So the left electrode will be the cathode as I have configured it, and the right electrode will be anode.
sentences.cn: 因此左边电极就成了阴极,正如我原来设定的一样，右边的电极就是阳极。

sentences.en: Support and guide the anode jacking frame during rack rising.
sentences.cn: 支撑并引导阳极提升机构框架的运动.

sentences.en: The cathode rays are always beamed on a fresh area of the anode surface.
sentences.cn: 阴极射线总是射向阳极表面的新区域.

sentences.en: The kit comes with an anode, a cathode, and an LED light.
sentences.cn: 这种套装电池包括一根阳极、一根阴极和一颗LED灯。

sentences.en: The porous LiAl - Ce alloy anode has the best charge and discharge properties.
sentences.cn: 添加铈的多孔锂铝合金阳极具有理想的充放电性能.

sentences.en: The reverse process may proceed at the anode.
sentences.cn: 相反的过程也会在阳极上发生.

sentences.en: The Ti - Ru anode voltage was measured during the electrolytic process.
